description:
In this talk the audience will learn how to package software in popular Linux distributions. The talk will cover using portable build tools like automake/autoconf/libtool and cmake; packaging RPMs and Debian dpkgs; how to get your package(s) into Fedora, EPEL and CentOS; plus use of Fedora and CentOS koji, as well as SuSE's Build System and Ubuntu Launchpad.

Links:
http://nosconf.github.io/
title: Distributing your Software for Linux
